about_box.profile.title: Profile
about_box.profile.text: Young computer science student and beginner developer.
about_box.about_me.title: About me
about_box.about_me.text:
My name is Clément Fossorier, and I am a student in computer science, as well as an apprentice developer.
After stopping my second year of computer science studies at the University Paris-Est Créteil (UPEC), I am preparing to enter ETNA: a work-study school in computer science.
Being passionate about computer science, especially development, I have learned to master the basics of several programming languages, including Java, PHP, HTML/CSS, Python, etc.
